类 JavaFXEuropeanChessDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • JavaFXEuropeanChessDisplay
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    JavaFXChessBoardDisplay

    public class JavaFXEuropeanChessDisplay
extends java.lang.Object
implements JavaFXChessBoardDisplay
    Rules for how we want a board to display for a game of European chess
    作者:
    Harold Connamacher, Bruce Dong
